title: Band
medium:
Medium: wool
Technique: slit tapestry, use of non-horizontal wefts; long slits up the side are sewn together; warp selvage at one end of each fragment; sides: ragged, some intact
creditline: Gift of Anonymous Donor in memory of Alexander M. Bing
description: Narrow band in dark red, black and shades of brown and tan. Pattern shows intricate step design.

tombstone.epitaph:
Band.
